Title: We Don't Go to Taelloch
Description:
This troubled Machine Speaker was here to do something. But what? It looks like something really did some damage to him.

We shouldn't dally. 

We need to head into Taelloch and look for the foreman. Can you clear the entryway into the town? Someone could get hurt!
ObjectivesText: Clear the entrance to Taelloch of encroaching beasts.
RewardText: There's not much to see in the foreman's office. If we want answers, we'll need to search the town.
